message:
When you first show a page/form, you need to *synchronously* initialize it into a kind of "loading" state and *start* the asynchronous operation to retrieve the data you need. Later, when the data arrives, *update* the existing page/form to show the data in the "loaded" state.

I prefer using asynchronous data binding for this (but the same general concepts apply to WinForms apps): [https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn605875.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn605875.aspx)
